snippet.title: Khale Ghezi
snippet.description: Happyland is a small village in Nowhere where people live together happily. The kids of the village go to Grandam’s house every day to learn things and play. But one night, the village is invaded by the wolves and all the kids are kidnapped. Hereby, Grandam gets really angry and goes to her hidden laboratory in order to save the kids with the tools she had invented herself...
